sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Immunization Data Registry Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Immunization Data Registry Act.

sections.heading: Definition. For the purpose of this Act, "Department" means the Department of Public Health.
sections.text: Definition. For the purpose of this Act, "Department" means the Department of Public Health.

Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2011.
